items.item_details: The Citizens Advisory Committee Meetings will begin at 4:00 p.m. each day in the Board Room of the Education Center.

Information explaining Citizens Advisory Committee meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Committee will be provided and/or read.  Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.
items.item_text: Information explaining Citizens Advisory Committee meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Committee will be provided and/or read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.
items.item_text_raw: 2.01 Information explaining Citizens Advisory Committee meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Committee will be provided and/or read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.

meeting_sections.section_name: WELCOME AND EXPLANATION TO AUDIENCE BY BOARD MEMBER J. MANUEL HERRERA

items.item_details:
EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT
	 
Item:  3.01
	 
	 
TO:
Citizens Advisory Committee
				 
				 
FROM: 
Rogelio Ruiz,Esq.
				 
				 
SUBJECT:
Briefing by Legal Counsel regarding Brown Act Provisions
	 
	 
	 
	 
Legal Counsel will present/discuss the Brown Act provisions.
items.item_text: Briefing by Legal Counsel regarding Brown Act Provisions
items.item_text_raw: 3.01 Briefing by Legal Counsel regarding Brown Act Provisions

items.item_details:
EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT
	 
Item:  3.02
	 
	 
TO:
Citizens Advisory Committee
				 
				 
SUBJECT:
Nomination/Selection of Citizens Advisory Committee Chairperson and Vice Chairperson
	 
	 
There will be a discussion and/or action to nominate/select a Chairperson and Vice Chairperson to the Citizens Advisory Committee
items.item_text: Nomination/Selection of Citizens Advisory Committee Chairperson and Vice Chairperson
items.item_text_raw: 3.02 Nomination/Selection of Citizens Advisory Committee Chairperson and Vice Chairperson

items.item_details: Any person may address the Citizens Advisory Committee on any item on the meeting agenda. Persons wishing to address the Committee must fill out a gold request form, which is located at the entrance of the Board Room. When your name is called, please come to the podium, state your name for the record, and limit your remarks to no more than two (2) minutes.
